content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's great to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Magdeburg to be a great place to live. Now, let's discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in your apartment and I'm looking to get the best deal possible. I'm a student, so I'm smart about my spending. I'm also very dependable and responsible. I'm not looking to be tricked into paying more than I should. I want to make sure that the price is fair and aligns with moral and ethical standards. I'm hoping to establish a good relationship with you as my landlord. How much are you offering for the apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, as a landlord, I understand that you're looking for a fair deal. I can assure you that I'm also committed to being fair and ethical in our negotiations. I believe in building a good relationship with my tenants, as it benefits both parties in the long run. I'm offering my apartment at a competitive price, and I'm open to discussing any concerns you may have. How much would you like to offer for the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your commitment to fairness and ethics. As a student, I'm on a budget, so I'm looking to pay a price that reflects the value of the apartment while also being mindful of my financial constraints. I'm willing to offer 500 Euro per month for the apartment. Is this within your acceptable range?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, your offer of 500 Euro per month is quite reasonable, and I'm willing to accept it. I believe this price reflects the value of the apartment and takes into account your budget as a student. Let's proceed with the lease agreement, and I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant. 'I agree to the price of 500 Euro!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful news, Mister Schmidt! I'm thrilled to have reached an agreement that meets both our needs. Your willingness to work with me on the price demonstrates your understanding of my situation as a student. I'm looking forward to signing the lease and moving into the apartment. 'I agree to the price of 500 Euro!' Thank you for your hospitality and fairness in this negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Yi-Nuo. I'm glad we were able to find a solution that works for both of us. Your appreciation is much valued. Once you've had a chance to review and sign the lease, we can discuss the move-in date and any other details you may have. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
